attributes.action: abolish the student loans system, instead replacing it with a nominal fixed increase in the basic rate tax for graduates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Abolish the current student loan system in favour of the introduction of an additional 1% tax for university graduates. Revenue raised will be used to pay tuition fees and additional maintenance grants removing the need for the current debt based system. 

This method will allow students to pay society back for the privilege of a university education without burdening them with debt and discriminating against students from financially disadvantaged backgrounds as the system currently stands.
